
# AltaPay 
![altapay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/altapay/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `altapay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] AltaPay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  AltaPay is a leading cross-border payment processor delivering a single payment solution across online, in-store and mobile channels in multiple currencies, payment methods and countries.  It is our mission to help business grow and expand into new markets with little friction by delivering fast, secure and unique omni-channel payment solution for merchants. We are experts in the many variables that occur during each transaction and the costs these can incur. With this knowledge, we’ve created the AltaPay platform that gives you the best, most secure and streamline payment process so you can focus on growth and global expansion. AltaPay makes payments less complicated.
